unnormalised: Hey, just a tip - for the biryani, try using 250 gms of basmati rice instead of the regular kind, and simmer it for about 20 mins on low heat. That way you get a better texture!
normalised: Hey, just a tip - for the biryani, try using two hundred and fifty grams of basmati rice instead of the regular kind, and simmer it for about twenty minutes on low heat. That way you get a better texture!
